data.eml:eml: Description of the tadpoles of two endemic frogs: the Phu Luang cascade frog Odorrana aureola (Anura: Ranidae) and the Isan big-headed frog Limnonectes isanensis (Anura: Dicroglossidae) from northeastern Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ampai, Natee, Rujirawan, Attapol, Arkajag, Jirachai, Mcleod, David S., Aowphol, Anchalee (2015): Description of the tadpoles of two endemic frogs: the Phu Luang cascade frog Odorrana aureola (Anura: Ranidae) and the Isan big-headed frog Limnonectes isanensis (Anura: Dicroglossidae) from northeastern Thailand. Zootaxa 3981 (4): 508-520, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.4.3
